document_data.name: Osper Linthalam
document_data.Activities: Osper devoted more time to political plots and mercantile dealings than to his magical research. He had great riches in his house and always had with him at last three guardian [[golem]]s.
document_data.History: Once in [[Selgaunt]] Osper destroyed an attacking pirate ship with his ''[[staff of power]]''.
document_data.Personality: Osper was very polite, loving fine wine and good feasts.
document_data.Possessions: Osper carried a ''staff of power'' and many enchanted [[ring]]s. A trio of [[stone golem]]s guarded his mansion in Ordulin.
